situation.title: Cinemas
situation.meta_description: Cinemas are not allowed to operate. This ban applies to movie screenings taking place both outdoors and indoors.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Cinemas are not allowed to operate. This ban applies to movie screenings taking place both outdoors and indoors.

questions_answers.question: Are home screenings among friends banned as well?
questions_answers.value: Given the regulations restricting free movement, home screenings are not allowed.
